arts.ttl: 'That's s***' - Gary Neville gives verdict on Man Utd moment that proved Arsenal difference
arts.sum: Manchester United conceded twice from corners in their Premier League defeat at Arsenal and their former skipper Gary Neville delivered a damning real-time reaction

arts.ttl: Every word Mikel Arteta said on Arsenal set-pieces, catching Liverpool and Gabriel injury
arts.sum: If we perform the way we're performing right now, we're going to win a lot of games. The team really has that belief that from every angle we have the mentality to threaten the opponent and try to score.

arts.ttl: Corners do the damage as Arsenal condemn Ruben Amorim to first Man Utd defeat
arts.sum: Jurrien Timber and William Saliba scored for the Gunners.
